  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(PIDFFConfig config, Controller.Type type, double period)
      Create a new object to control PID + FF logic for a subsystem.

      Sets kP, kI, kD, kS, kV, kG, period values.

      Parameters:
      config - PIDFFConfig object containing PID and Feedforward constants.
      type - The type of setpoint used by the controller
      period - The controller's update rate in seconds. Must be non-zero and positive.

    • Controller

      public Controller(PIDFFConfig config, Controller.Type type)
      Create a new object to control PID + FF logic for a subsystem.

      Sets kP, kI, kD, kS, kV, kG values.

      Parameters:
      config - PIDFFConfig object containing PID and Feedforward constants.
      type - The type of setpoint used by the controller

      public void setMeasurementSource(NAR_Motor motor)
      Sets a motor's velocity/position as the measurement source
      Parameters:
      motor - NAR_Motor motor type.

    • calculatePID

      public double calculatePID(double measurement)
      Returns the PID output of the controller.
      Specified by:
      calculatePID in class ControllerBase
      Parameters:
      measurement - the current measurement of the process variable.
      Returns:
      The controller output due to PID terms.

    • calculateFF

      public double calculateFF(double pidOutput)
      Returns the Feed Forward output of the controller.

      Uses kS, kG, and optionally kV

      Specified by:
      calculateFF in class ControllerBase
      Parameters:
      pidOutput - the current measurement of the process variable.
      Returns:
      The controller output due to Feed Forward terms.

    • getType

      public Controller.Type getType()
      Returns the type of setpoint used by the controller
      Returns:
      Controller.Type: VELOCITY, POSITION, NONE
